Sentencas: Tetragonal perovskite phase Ce0.9Ca0.1AlO2.95 + x was obtained for the first time.
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: Such phase, containing cerium in the oxidation state of 3+, can be promising anode materials for a solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: Ce0.9Ca0.1AlO2.95 + _ (space group I4/mcm) was synthesized by the solid-phase method at 1400 & DEG;C in a nitrogen flow with using ammonium oxalate (NH4)2C2O4 to create a reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: Thermogravimetry results showed that Ce0.9Ca0.1AlO2.95 + x was stable to oxidation up to 500 & DEG;C in air and up to 700 & DEG;C in argon (partial pressure of oxygen pO2 =10-4 bar).
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient measured by dilatometry was equal to 11.16.10-6 K-1.
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: The temperature dependences of the electrical conductivity (for undoped phase CeAlO3 s = 1.10-3 S/cm and for doped Ce0.9Ca0.1AlO2.95 + x s = 3.10-2 S/cm at 500 & DEG;C in air) were obtained by the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements).
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of these samples at the temperatures range of 350-500 & DEG;C was almost independent of the partial pressure of oxygen pO2 from 10-18 to 0.21 bar, however, there was a slight negative slope at T > 500 & DEG;C (pO2).
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: The total ionic transport numbers measured by the EMF method were close to 1.10-3, which indicated the dominance of electronic conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3

Sentencas: The measurement of the sign of the thermal-EMF showed that positive charge carriers (holes) were dominant charge carriers.& COPY; 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Preparation, electrical and thermal properties of new anode material based on Ca-doped perovskite CeAlO3
